description: The single-level Bill of Material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. In As-Planned lifecycle state all variants are covered ("120% BOM"). It includes multiple suppliers for the same component.

urn_samm_io.catenax.single_level_bom_as_.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.single_level_bom_as_.description: Quantifiable number of objects in reference to the measurementUnit

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.

urn_samm_io.catenax.single_level_bom_as_.description: Describes the quantity in which the child part is assembled in the given parent object by providing a quantity value and the measurement unit in which the quantity is measured.

quantityNumber.description: The number of objects related to the measurement unit

measurementUnit.description: Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects

urn_samm_io.catenax.single_level_bom_as_.description: Catena-X ID and meta data of the child part.

createdOn.description: Timestamp when the relation between the parent part and the child part was created

quantity.description: Quantity of which the child part is assembled into the parent part.

lastModifiedOn.description: Timestamp when the relationship between parent part and child part was last modified.

childCatenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the child object which is assembled into the given parent part.

urn_samm_io.catenax.single_level_bom_as_.description: Set of child parts the parent object is assembled by (one structural level down).

catenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the component), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

childParts.description: Set of child parts in As-Planned lifecycle phase, of which the given parent object is assembled by (one structural level down).
